ai-patthana16.30:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.30:1.1_0: There is no precuration with placing the mind and keeping it connected to the teaching. For one doesn’t give rise to diversity of thoughts.
ai-patthana16.30:2.1_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana16.30:2.1_3: whose majority has not been shared.
